thread.title: State issues hefty fines against insurers over autism coverage
thread.title_full: State issues hefty fines against insurers over autism coverage

author: Jeff Manning | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: State issues hefty fines against insurers over autism coverage
text: The Oregon Insurance Division issued proposed fines of over half-a-million dollars Thursday against insurers violating state rules and refusing to cover certain autism therapies. It is sweet vindication for a citizen activist who's been fighting the industry for better coverage for nearly a decade.
